definition: to serve (in some capacity)/to work for
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: What about it? I may po ibly be of help.
sentences.chinese: 什麼產品？也許我能效勞。

sentences.english: Pigs are born to give, to yield and to serve.
sentences.chinese: 屬豬者天生樂於付出，謙讓，爲他人效勞。

sentences.english: Clerk: Good afternoon, madam. How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 下午好，女士。有什麼能爲您效勞的嗎？

sentences.english: Good morning. Housekeeping . May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，客房部。需要我效勞嗎？

sentences.english: Kvin: Good morning, Hln. What can I do for you?
sentences.chinese: 早安，海倫。有什麼我能效勞的嗎？

sentences.english: Booking office of Cathay Pacific. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司售票處，有什麼可以爲你效勞嗎？

sentences.english: Emily, my assistant, will help you if you find any interested items.
sentences.chinese: 如你有喜歡的產品，我的助手於莉會爲你效勞。

sentences.english: Druggist: Hi. May I help you?
Ahh! nadine the beauty queen. how can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我是美麗的女王有什麼可以效勞的？

sentences.english: That is the promise our nation makes to those who serve.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們國家對於爲國效勞的人們的承諾。

sentences.english: This is " new long happiness". Good morning. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早安，這裏是新長福。能爲您效勞嗎？

sentences.english: Good afternoon, madam. May I help you ?
sentences.chinese: 下戰書好，夫人。能爲您效勞嗎？

sentences.english: Supplier to its dispatch field service personnel bear full responsibility for all acts.
sentences.chinese: 供方對其派呈現場效勞人員的一切行爲負全部責任。
願爲我最好的顧客效勞。

sentences.english: Salesgirl: Welcome to KFC! What can I do for you?
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨肯德基，有什麼我能效勞的？

sentences.english: A: Empire Hotel Reservations. How may I help you?
sentences.chinese: 甲:帝京酒店訂房部，有什麼可以爲你效勞？
